price: 23. Ir jo kompanjonas (angelas) pasakys: „Štai su manimi yra (jo byla)!“
arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqāla qarīnuhu hādhā mā ladayya ʿatīdun
